definitions.definition: ( countable ) A flat pastry pressed with a grid pattern , often eaten hot with butter and/or honey or syrup .
examples: The brunch was waffles with strawberries and whipped cream.

definitions.definition: ( countable , British ) In full potato waffle : a savoury flat potato cake with the same kind of grid pattern.
( construction , also attributively ) A concrete slab used in flooring with a gridlike structure of ribs running at right angles to each other on its underside .
( textiles , chiefly attributively ) A type of fabric woven with a honeycomb texture .

main_definition: ( countable ) A flat pastry pressed with a grid pattern , often eaten hot with butter and/or honey or syrup .
secondary_definitions: ( countable , British ) In full potato waffle : a savoury flat potato cake with the same kind of grid pattern.
( construction , also attributively ) A concrete slab used in flooring with a gridlike structure of ribs running at right angles to each other on its underside .
( textiles , chiefly attributively ) A type of fabric woven with a honeycomb texture .

definitions.definition: ( colloquial ) (Often lengthy ) speech or writing that is evasive or vague , or pretentious .
examples: This interesting point seems to get lost a little within a lot of self-important waffle .

main_definition: ( colloquial ) (Often lengthy ) speech or writing that is evasive or vague , or pretentious .

definitions.definition: The high-pitched sound made by a young dog ; also, a muffled bark .

main_definition: ( British , dialectal ) The high-pitched sound made by a young dog ; also, a muffled bark .
